page.title: 17P.C.Day
page.content: P.C.Day,who now lives in Kibworth,is our local policeman.He has been in the police force for 6 years.His training was very hard.In one week he comes through Church Langton about 14 times. He says that the most common crime in this area is theft from cars.He goes round the area in a police car and in the boot carries traffic cones,slow signs,accident signs,first aid kit, breathalyser kit,tape measure and blankets.His favourite job is meeting and helping people.The most unpleasant thing he has to do is to tell parents that their child has been knocked down in an accident.P.C.Day comes to our schoolabout twice a year to tell us about road and water safety.His hobbies are gardening,walking and doing things around the house.He has a school Christmas dinner with us.
